# Abyssal Blood, Lesser (Su)
## Overview
*Abyssal Blood, Lesser (Su)*: While raging, the barbarian gains two claw attacks. These attacks are considered primary attacks and are made at the barbarianâ€™s full base attack bonus. They deal 1d6 points of slashing damage for Medium creatures (1d4 if Small) plus her Strength modifier.

**Source:** Advanced Class Guide, pg. 80
